name: intellistore-iims
description: IntelliStore - Multi-modal Storage System with Real-time Analytics

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "npx http-server . -p 3000 -c-1"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "npx http-server . -p 3000 -c-1"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ..

author: IntelliStore Team
